short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A small chat component for the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tidi is a small and simple chat component allowing you to chat on the web with your friends or other people using the same roomKey as you do !
Running in a separate pop-up, you're, you can close and open it whenever you want !
